title: Modern Mangalsutra: Rose Gold Diamond Pendant Black Beads Chain
materials: Rose Gold plated alloy with black beads and cubic zirconia (CZ) stones. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine and durability.
features: A delicate two-layered Mangalsutra featuring a slender rose gold chain adorned with traditional black beads, known as 'Nalla Pusalu'. The pendants showcase a floral design encrusted with shimmering cubic zirconia stones, offering a contemporary twist to a timeless classic.
colors: Rose gold and black beads with sparkling white CZ stones.
occasions: or small gatherings. A modern and stylish alternative to traditional Mangalsutras.
description: This Mangalsutra beautifully combines traditional elements with modern aesthetics, making it a versatile piece for the contemporary woman. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability, while the delicate design makes it comfortable for daily wear. The black beads symbolize protection and well-being, adding a touch of cultural significance.
